00102 bool localizationCallback(LocalizationInterfaceSrv::Request& req, LocalizationInterfaceSrv::Response& res)
00103 {  
00104   vector2f loc(req.loc_x, req.loc_y);
00105   if(debugLevel>0) printf("Setting location: %f %f %f\u00b0 on %s\n",V2COMP(loc),DEG(req.orientation),req.map.c_str());
00106   localization->setLocation(loc, req.orientation,req.map.c_str(),0.01,RAD(1.0));
00107   return true;
00108 }

00110 void ClearGUI()
00111 {
00112   guiMsg.lines_p1x.clear();
00113   guiMsg.lines_p1y.clear();
00114   guiMsg.lines_p2x.clear();
00115   guiMsg.lines_p2y.clear();
00116   guiMsg.points_x.clear();
00117   guiMsg.points_y.clear();
00118   guiMsg.lines_col.clear();
00119   guiMsg.points_col.clear();
00120   guiMsg.circles_x.clear();
00121   guiMsg.circles_y.clear();
00122   guiMsg.circles_col.clear();
00123   
00124   guiMsg.windowSize = 1.0;
00125 }
00126 
00127 void drawPointCloud()
00128 {
00129   //printf("publishing %d points\n",(int) pointCloud.size());
00130   
00131   for(int i=0; i<(int) pointCloud.size(); i++){
00132     guiMsg.points_x.push_back(pointCloud[i].x);
00133     guiMsg.points_y.push_back(pointCloud[i].y);
00134     guiMsg.points_col.push_back(0xDE2352);
00135   }
00136 }
00137 
00138 void publishLocation(bool limitRate)
00139 {
00140   static double tLast = 0;
00141   if(GetTimeSec()-tLast<0.03 && limitRate)
00142     return;
00143   tLast = GetTimeSec();
00144   LocalizationMsg msg;
00145   localization->computeLocation(curLoc, curAngle);
00146   msg.timeStamp = GetTimeSec();
00147   msg.x = curLoc.x;
00148   msg.y = curLoc.y;
00149   msg.angle = curAngle;
00150   msg.map = string(localization->getCurrentMapName());
00151   
00152   localization->getUncertainty(msg.angleUncertainty, msg.locationUncertainty);
00153   
00154   VectorLocalization2D::EvalValues laserEval, pointCloudEval;
00155   localization->getEvalValues(laserEval,pointCloudEval);
00156   msg.laserNumCorrespondences = laserEval.numCorrespondences;
00157   msg.laserNumObservedPoints = laserEval.numObservedPoints;
00158   msg.laserStage0Weights = laserEval.stage0Weights;
00159   msg.laserStageRWeights = laserEval.stageRWeights;
00160   msg.laserRunTime = laserEval.runTime;
00161   msg.lastLaserRunTime = laserEval.lastRunTime;
00162   msg.laserMeanSqError = laserEval.meanSqError;
00163   
00164   msg.pointCloudNumCorrespondences = pointCloudEval.numCorrespondences;
00165   msg.pointCloudNumObservedPoints = pointCloudEval.numObservedPoints;
00166   msg.pointCloudStage0Weights = pointCloudEval.stage0Weights;
00167   msg.pointCloudStageRWeights = pointCloudEval.stageRWeights;
00168   msg.pointCloudRunTime = pointCloudEval.runTime;
00169   msg.lastPointCloudRunTime = pointCloudEval.lastRunTime;
00170   msg.pointCloudMeanSqError = pointCloudEval.meanSqError;
00171   
00172   localizationPublisher.publish(msg);
00173   
00174   //Publish particles
00175   vector<Particle2D> particles;
00176   localization->getParticles(particles);
00177   particlesMsg.poses.resize(particles.size()); 
00178   geometry_msgs::Pose particle;
00179   for(unsigned int i=0; i<particles.size(); i++){
00180     particle.position.x = particles[i].loc.x;
00181     particle.position.y = particles[i].loc.y;
00182     particle.position.z = 0;
00183     particle.orientation.w = cos(0.5*particles[i].angle);
00184     particle.orientation.x = 0;
00185     particle.orientation.y = 0;
00186     particle.orientation.z = sin(0.5*particles[i].angle);
00187     particlesMsg.poses[i] = particle;
00188   }
00189   particlesPublisher.publish(particlesMsg);
00190   
00191   //Publish map to base_footprint tf
00192   try{
00193     tf::StampedTransform odomToBaseTf;
00194     transformListener->lookupTransform("odom","base_footprint",ros::Time(0), odomToBaseTf);
00195     
00196     vector2f map_base_trans = curLoc;
00197     float map_base_rot = curAngle;
00198     
00199     vector2f odom_base_trans(odomToBaseTf.getOrigin().x(), odomToBaseTf.getOrigin().y());
00200     float odom_base_rot = 2.0*atan2(odomToBaseTf.getRotation().z(), odomToBaseTf.getRotation().w());
00201     
00202     vector2f base_odom_trans = -odom_base_trans.rotate(-odom_base_rot);
00203     float base_odom_rot = -odom_base_rot;
00204     
00205     vector2f map_odom_trans = map_base_trans + base_odom_trans.rotate(map_base_rot);
00206     float map_odom_rot = angle_mod(map_base_rot + base_odom_rot);
00207     
00208     tf::Transform mapToOdomTf;
00209     mapToOdomTf.setOrigin(tf::Vector3(V2COMP(map_odom_trans), 0.0));
00210     mapToOdomTf.setRotation(tf::Quaternion(tf::Vector3(0,0,1),map_odom_rot));
00211     transformBroadcaster->sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(mapToOdomTf, ros::Time::now(), "map", "odom"));
00212   }
00213   catch (tf::TransformException ex){
00214     //Do nothing: We'll just try again next time
00215   }
00216 }
00217 
00218 void publishGUI()
00219 { 
00220   static double tLast = 0;
00221   static double publishInterval = 0.016;
00222   if(debugLevel<0 || GetTimeSec()-tLast<publishInterval)
00223     return;
00224   tLast = GetTimeSec();
00225   ClearGUI();
00226   //DrawMap();
00227   guiMsg.robotLocX = curLoc.x;
00228   guiMsg.robotLocY = curLoc.y;
00229   guiMsg.robotAngle = curAngle;
00230   localization->drawDisplay(guiMsg.lines_p1x, guiMsg.lines_p1y, guiMsg.lines_p2x, guiMsg.lines_p2y, guiMsg.lines_col, guiMsg.points_x, guiMsg.points_y, guiMsg.points_col, guiMsg.circles_x, guiMsg.circles_y, guiMsg.circles_col, 1.0);
00231   //drawPointCloud();
00232   guiPublisher.publish(guiMsg);
00233 }
00234 
00235 void LoadParameters()
00236 {
00237   WatchFiles watch_files;
00238   ConfigReader config(ros::package::getPath("cgr_localization").append("/").c_str());
00239   
00240   config.init(watch_files);
00241   
00242   config.addFile("config/localization_parameters.cfg");
00243   config.addFile("config/kinect_parameters.cfg");
00244   
00245   if(!config.readFiles()){
00246     printf("Failed to read config\n");
00247     exit(1);
00248   }
00249   
00250   {
00251     ConfigReader::SubTree c(config,"KinectParameters");
00252     
00253     unsigned int maxDepthVal;
00254     bool error = false;
00255     error = error || !c.getReal("f",kinectDepthCam.f);
00256     error = error || !c.getReal("fovH",kinectDepthCam.fovH);
00257     error = error || !c.getReal("fovV",kinectDepthCam.fovV);
00258     error = error || !c.getInt("width",kinectDepthCam.width);
00259     error = error || !c.getInt("height",kinectDepthCam.height);
00260     error = error || !c.getUInt("maxDepthVal",maxDepthVal);
00261     kinectDepthCam.maxDepthVal = maxDepthVal;    
00262     
00263     vector3f kinectLoc;
00264     float xRot, yRot, zRot;
00265     error = error || !c.getVec3f("loc",kinectLoc);
00266     error = error || !c.getReal("xRot",xRot);
00267     error = error || !c.getReal("yRot",yRot);
00268     error = error || !c.getReal("zRot",zRot);
00269     kinectToRobotTransform.xyzRotationAndTransformation(xRot,yRot,zRot,kinectLoc);
00270     
00271     if(error){
00272       printf("Error Loading Kinect Parameters!\n");
00273       exit(2);
00274     }
00275   } 
00276   
00277   {
00278     ConfigReader::SubTree c(config,"PlaneFilteringParameters");
00279     
00280     bool error = false;
00281     error = error || !c.getUInt("maxPoints",filterParams.maxPoints);
00282     error = error || !c.getUInt("numSamples",filterParams.numSamples);
00283     error = error || !c.getUInt("numLocalSamples",filterParams.numLocalSamples);
00284     error = error || !c.getUInt("planeSize",filterParams.planeSize);
00285     error = error || !c.getReal("maxError",filterParams.maxError);
00286     error = error || !c.getReal("maxDepthDiff",filterParams.maxDepthDiff);
00287     error = error || !c.getReal("minInlierFraction",filterParams.minInlierFraction);
00288     error = error || !c.getReal("WorldPlaneSize",filterParams.WorldPlaneSize);
00289     error = error || !c.getUInt("numRetries",filterParams.numRetries);
00290     filterParams.runPolygonization = false;
00291     
00292     if(error){
00293       printf("Error Loading Plane Filtering Parameters!\n");
00294       exit(2);
00295     }
00296   } 
00297   
00298   {
00299     ConfigReader::SubTree c(config,"initialConditions");
00300     
00301     bool error = false;
00302     curMapName = string(c.getStr("mapName"));
00303     error = error || curMapName.length()==0;
00304     error = error || !c.getVec2f("loc",initialLoc);
00305     error = error || !c.getReal("angle", initialAngle);
00306     error = error || !c.getReal("locUncertainty", locUncertainty);
00307     error = error || !c.getReal("angleUncertainty", angleUncertainty);
00308     
00309     if(error){
00310       printf("Error Loading Initial Conditions!\n");
00311       exit(2);
00312     }
00313   }
00314   
00315   {
00316     ConfigReader::SubTree c(config,"motionParams");
00317     
00318     bool error = false;
00319     error = error || !c.getReal("Alpha1", motionParams.Alpha1);
00320     error = error || !c.getReal("Alpha2", motionParams.Alpha2);
00321     error = error || !c.getReal("Alpha3", motionParams.Alpha3);
00322     error = error || !c.getReal("kernelSize", motionParams.kernelSize);
00323     
00324     
00325     if(error){
00326       printf("Error Loading Predict Parameters!\n");
00327       exit(2);
00328     }
00329   }
00330   
00331   {
00332     ConfigReader::SubTree c(config,"lidarParams");
00333     
00334     bool error = false;
00335     // Laser sensor properties
00336     error = error || !c.getReal("angleResolution", lidarParams.angleResolution);
00337     error = error || !c.getInt("numRays", lidarParams.numRays);
00338     error = error || !c.getReal("maxRange", lidarParams.maxRange);
00339     error = error || !c.getReal("minRange", lidarParams.minRange);
00340     
00341     // Pose of laser sensor on robot
00342     vector2f laserToBaseTrans;
00343     float xRot, yRot, zRot;
00344     error = error || !c.getVec2f<vector2f>("laserToBaseTrans", laserToBaseTrans);
00345     error = error || !c.getReal("xRot", xRot);
00346     error = error || !c.getReal("yRot", yRot);
00347     error = error || !c.getReal("zRot", zRot);
00348     Matrix3f laserToBaseRot;
00349     laserToBaseRot = AngleAxisf(xRot, Vector3f::UnitX()) * AngleAxisf(yRot, Vector3f::UnitY()) * AngleAxisf(zRot, Vector3f::UnitZ());
00350     lidarParams.laserToBaseTrans = Vector2f(V2COMP(laserToBaseTrans));
00351     lidarParams.laserToBaseRot = laserToBaseRot.block(0,0,2,2);
00352     
00353     // Parameters related to observation update
00354     error = error || !c.getReal("logObstacleProb", lidarParams.logObstacleProb);
00355     error = error || !c.getReal("logOutOfRangeProb", lidarParams.logOutOfRangeProb);
00356     error = error || !c.getReal("logShortHitProb", lidarParams.logShortHitProb);
00357     error = error || !c.getReal("correlationFactor", lidarParams.correlationFactor);
00358     error = error || !c.getReal("lidarStdDev", lidarParams.lidarStdDev);
00359     error = error || !c.getReal("attractorRange", lidarParams.attractorRange);
00360     error = error || !c.getReal("kernelSize", lidarParams.kernelSize);
00361     
00362     // Parameters related to observation refine
00363     error = error || !c.getInt("minPoints", lidarParams.minPoints);
00364     error = error || !c.getInt("numSteps", lidarParams.numSteps);
00365     error = error || !c.getReal("etaAngle", lidarParams.etaAngle);
00366     error = error || !c.getReal("etaLoc", lidarParams.etaLoc);
00367     error = error || !c.getReal("maxAngleGradient", lidarParams.maxAngleGradient);
00368     error = error || !c.getReal("maxLocGradient", lidarParams.maxLocGradient);
00369     error = error || !c.getReal("minCosAngleError", lidarParams.minCosAngleError);
00370     error = error || !c.getReal("correspondenceMargin", lidarParams.correspondenceMargin);
00371     error = error || !c.getReal("minRefineFraction", lidarParams.minRefineFraction);
00372     
00373     lidarParams.initialize();
00374     
00375     if(error){
00376       printf("Error Loading Lidar Parameters!\n");
00377       exit(2);
00378     }
00379   }
00380   
00381   {
00382     ConfigReader::SubTree c(config,"pointCloudParams");
00383     
00384     bool error = false;
00385     error = error || !c.getReal("logObstacleProb", pointCloudParams.logObstacleProb);
00386     error = error || !c.getReal("logShortHitProb", pointCloudParams.logShortHitProb);
00387     error = error || !c.getReal("logOutOfRangeProb", pointCloudParams.logOutOfRangeProb);
00388     error = error || !c.getReal("correlationFactor", pointCloudParams.corelationFactor);
00389     error = error || !c.getReal("stdDev", pointCloudParams.stdDev);
00390     error = error || !c.getReal("kernelSize", pointCloudParams.kernelSize);
00391     error = error || !c.getReal("attractorRange", pointCloudParams.attractorRange);
00392     error = error || !c.getReal("maxRange", pointCloudParams.maxRange);
00393     error = error || !c.getReal("minRange", pointCloudParams.minRange);
00394     
00395     error = error || !c.getReal("attractorRange", pointCloudParams.attractorRange);
00396     error = error || !c.getReal("etaAngle", pointCloudParams.etaAngle);
00397     error = error || !c.getReal("etaLoc", pointCloudParams.etaLoc);
00398     error = error || !c.getReal("maxAngleGradient", pointCloudParams.maxAngleGradient);
00399     error = error || !c.getReal("maxLocGradient", pointCloudParams.maxLocGradient);
00400     error = error || !c.getReal("minCosAngleError", pointCloudParams.minCosAngleError);
00401     error = error || !c.getInt("numSteps", pointCloudParams.numSteps);
00402     error = error || !c.getInt("minPoints", pointCloudParams.minPoints);
00403     error = error || !c.getReal("minRange", pointCloudParams.minRange);
00404     error = error || !c.getReal("maxRange", pointCloudParams.maxRange);
00405     error = error || !c.getReal("correspondenceMargin", pointCloudParams.correspondenceMargin);
00406     error = error || !c.getReal("minRefineFraction", pointCloudParams.minRefineFraction);
00407     
00408     if(error){
00409       printf("Error Loading Point Cloud Parameters!\n");
00410       exit(2);
00411     }
00412   }
00413   
00414   planeFilter.setParameters(&kinectDepthCam,filterParams);
00415 }
00416 
00417 void InitModels(){
00418   lidarParams.laserScan = (float*) malloc(lidarParams.numRays*sizeof(float));
00419   
00420   filteredPointCloudMsg.header.seq = 0;
00421   filteredPointCloudMsg.header.frame_id = "base_footprint"; 
00422   filteredPointCloudMsg.channels.clear();
00423   
00424   return;
00425 }
00426 
00427 void odometryCallback(const nav_msgs::OdometryConstPtr &msg)
00428 { 
00429   static float angle = 0;
00430   static vector2f loc(0,0);
00431   static bool initialized=false;
00432   static double tLast = 0;
00433   
00434   if(tLast>msg->header.stamp.toSec())
00435     initialized = false;
00436   
00437   if(!initialized){
00438     angle = tf::getYaw(msg->pose.pose.orientation);
00439     loc = vector2f(msg->pose.pose.position.x, msg->pose.pose.position.y);
00440     initialized = true;
00441     return;
00442   }
00443   
00444   float newAngle = tf::getYaw(msg->pose.pose.orientation);
00445   vector2f newLoc(msg->pose.pose.position.x, msg->pose.pose.position.y);
00446   
00447   vector2f d = (newLoc-loc).rotate(-angle);
00448   double dx = d.x;
00449   double dy = d.y;
00450   double dtheta = angle_mod(newAngle-angle);
00451   
00452   if((sq(dx)+sq(dy))>sq(0.4) || fabs(dtheta)>RAD(40)){
00453     printf("Odometry out of bounds: x:%7.3f y:%7.3f a:%7.3f\u00b0\n",dx, dy, DEG(dtheta));
00454     angle = newAngle;
00455     loc = newLoc;
00456     return;
00457   }
00458   
00459   if(debugLevel>0) printf("Odometry t:%f x:%7.3f y:%7.3f a:%7.3f\u00b0\n",msg->header.stamp.toSec(), dx, dy, DEG(dtheta));
00460   
00461   localization->predict(dx, dy, dtheta, motionParams);
00462   
00463   angle = newAngle;
00464   loc = newLoc;
00465 }
00466 
00467 void lidarCallback(const sensor_msgs::LaserScan &msg)
00468 {
00469   //FunctionTimer ft(__PRETTY_FUNCTION__);
00470   if(debugLevel>0){
00471     printf("LIDAR n:%d t:%f noLidar:%d\n",(int) msg.ranges.size(), msg.scan_time, noLidar?1:0);
00472   }
00473   
00474   tf::StampedTransform baseLinkToLaser;
00475   try{
00476     transformListener->lookupTransform("base_footprint", msg.header.frame_id, ros::Time(0), baseLinkToLaser);
00477   }
00478   catch(tf::TransformException ex){
00479     ROS_ERROR("%s",ex.what());
00480   }
00481   tf::Vector3 translationTf = baseLinkToLaser.getOrigin();
00482   tf::Quaternion rotationTf = baseLinkToLaser.getRotation();
00483   
00484   Quaternionf rotQuat3D(rotationTf.w(), rotationTf.x(), rotationTf.y(), rotationTf.z());
00485   Matrix3f rot3D(rotQuat3D);
00486   Vector3f trans3D(translationTf.x(), translationTf.y(),translationTf.z());
00487   
00488   trans3D = rot3D*trans3D;
00489   lidarParams.laserToBaseRot = rot3D.topLeftCorner(2,2);
00490   lidarParams.laserToBaseTrans = trans3D.topLeftCorner(2,1);
00491   
00492   bool newLaser = lidarParams.minRange != msg.range_min || 
00493     lidarParams.maxRange != msg.range_max ||
00494     lidarParams.minAngle != msg.angle_min || 
00495     lidarParams.maxAngle != msg.angle_max ||
00496     lidarParams.angleResolution != msg.angle_increment ||
00497     lidarParams.numRays != int(msg.ranges.size());
00498   if(newLaser){
00499     lidarParams.minRange = msg.range_min;
00500     lidarParams.maxRange = msg.range_max;
00501     lidarParams.minAngle = msg.angle_min;
00502     lidarParams.maxAngle = msg.angle_max;
00503     lidarParams.angleResolution = msg.angle_increment;
00504     lidarParams.numRays = int(msg.ranges.size());
00505     lidarParams.initialize();
00506   }
00507   
00508   if(int(msg.ranges.size()) != lidarParams.numRays){
00509     TerminalWarning("Incorrect number of Laser Scan rays!");
00510     printf("received: %d\n",int(msg.ranges.size()));
00511   }
00512   
00513   for(int i=0; i<(int)msg.ranges.size(); i++)
00514     lidarParams.laserScan[i] = msg.ranges[i];
00515   
00516   
00517   if(!noLidar){
00518     localization->refineLidar(lidarParams);
00519     localization->updateLidar(lidarParams, motionParams);
00520     localization->resample(VectorLocalization2D::LowVarianceResampling);
00521     localization->computeLocation(curLoc,curAngle);
00522   }
00523 }
00524 
00525 
00526 void depthCallback(const sensor_msgs::Image &msg)
00527 {
00528   //Copy the depth data
00529   if(debugLevel>0){
00530     printf("Depth Message t:%f\n", msg.header.stamp.toSec());
00531   }
00532   const uint8_t* ptrSrc = msg.data.data();
00533   uint16_t depth[640*480];
00534   memcpy(depth, ptrSrc, 640*480*(sizeof(uint16_t)));
00535   
00536   if(!usePointCloud)
00537     return;
00538   
00539   tf::StampedTransform baseLinkToKinect;
00540   try{
00541     transformListener->lookupTransform("base_footprint", msg.header.frame_id, ros::Time(0), baseLinkToKinect);
00542   }
00543   catch(tf::TransformException ex){
00544     ROS_ERROR("%s",ex.what());
00545   }
00546   tf::Vector3 translationTf = baseLinkToKinect.getOrigin();
00547   tf::Quaternion rotationTf = baseLinkToKinect.getRotation();
00548   Quaternionf rotQuat3D(rotationTf.w(), rotationTf.x(), rotationTf.y(), rotationTf.z());
00549   Matrix3f rotMatrix(rotQuat3D);
00550   kinectToRobotTransform.m11 = rotMatrix(0,0);
00551   kinectToRobotTransform.m12 = rotMatrix(0,1);
00552   kinectToRobotTransform.m13 = rotMatrix(0,2);
00553   kinectToRobotTransform.m14 = translationTf.x();
00554   kinectToRobotTransform.m21 = rotMatrix(1,0);
00555   kinectToRobotTransform.m22 = rotMatrix(1,1);
00556   kinectToRobotTransform.m23 = rotMatrix(1,2);
00557   kinectToRobotTransform.m24 = translationTf.y();
00558   kinectToRobotTransform.m31 = rotMatrix(2,0);
00559   kinectToRobotTransform.m32 = rotMatrix(2,1);
00560   kinectToRobotTransform.m33 = rotMatrix(2,2);
00561   kinectToRobotTransform.m34 = translationTf.z();
00562   kinectToRobotTransform.m41 = 0;
00563   kinectToRobotTransform.m42 = 0;
00564   kinectToRobotTransform.m43 = 0;
00565   kinectToRobotTransform.m44 = 1;
00566   
00567   //Generate filtered point cloud  
00568   vector<vector3f> filteredPointCloud;
00569   vector<vector3f> pointCloudNormals;
00570   vector<vector3f> outlierCloud;
00571   vector<vector2i> pixelLocs;
00572   vector<PlanePolygon> planePolygons;
00573   
00574   planeFilter.GenerateFilteredPointCloud(depth, filteredPointCloud, pixelLocs, pointCloudNormals, outlierCloud, planePolygons);
00575   
00576   //Transform from kinect coordinates to robot coordinates
00577   
00578   for(unsigned int i=0; i<filteredPointCloud.size(); i++){
00579     filteredPointCloud[i] = filteredPointCloud[i].transform(kinectToRobotTransform);
00580     pointCloudNormals[i] = pointCloudNormals[i].transform(kinectToRobotTransform);
00581   }
00582   
00583 
00584   if(debugLevel>0){
00585     filteredPointCloudMsg.points.clear();
00586     filteredPointCloudMsg.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
00587     
00588     vector<geometry_msgs::Point32>* points = &(filteredPointCloudMsg.points);
00589     geometry_msgs::Point32 p;
00590     for(int i=0; i<(int)filteredPointCloud.size(); i++){
00591       p.x = filteredPointCloud[i].x;
00592       p.y = filteredPointCloud[i].y;
00593       p.z = filteredPointCloud[i].z;
00594       points->push_back(p);
00595     }
00596     filteredPointCloudPublisher.publish(filteredPointCloudMsg);
00597   }
00598   
00599   //Call particle filter
00600   {
00601     vector<vector2f> pointCloud2D, pointCloudNormals2D;
00602     
00603     for(unsigned int i=0; i<filteredPointCloud.size(); i++){
00604       if(fabs(pointCloudNormals[i].z)>sin(RAD(30.0)))
00605         continue;
00606       
00607       vector2f curNormal(V2COMP(pointCloudNormals[i]));
00608       vector2f curPoint(V2COMP(filteredPointCloud[i]));
00609       curNormal.normalize();
00610       pointCloudNormals2D.push_back(curNormal);
00611       pointCloud2D.push_back(curPoint);
00612     }
00613     
00614     localization->refinePointCloud(pointCloud2D, pointCloudNormals2D, pointCloudParams);
00615     localization->updatePointCloud(pointCloud2D, pointCloudNormals2D, motionParams, pointCloudParams);
00616     localization->resample(VectorLocalization2D::LowVarianceResampling);
00617     localization->computeLocation(curLoc,curAngle);
00618   }
00619 }
00620 
00621 void initialPoseCallback(const geometry_msgs::PoseWithCovarianceStamped &msg)
00622 {
00623   float angle = 2.0*asin(msg.pose.pose.orientation.z);
00624   vector2f loc(V2COMP(msg.pose.pose.position));
00625   printf("Initializing CGR localization at %.3f,%.3f, %.2f\u00b0\n",V2COMP(loc), DEG(angle));
00626   //localization->initialize(numParticles,curMapName.c_str(), loc, angle,sqrt(msg.pose.covariance[0]),sqrt(msg.pose.covariance[35]));
00627   localization->initialize(numParticles,curMapName.c_str(), loc, angle,0.01,RAD(1.0));
00628 }
00629 
00630 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00631 { 
00632   //========================= Load Parameters from config file ======================
00633   LoadParameters();
00634   
00635   //========================== Set up Command line parameters =======================
00636   static struct poptOption options[] = {
00637     { "num-particles",    'n', POPT_ARG_INT,     &numParticles,       0, "Number of Particles",   "NUM"},
00638     { "debug",            'd', POPT_ARG_INT,     &debugLevel,         0, "Debug Level",           "NUM"},
00639     { "start-x",          'x', POPT_ARG_DOUBLE,  &initialLoc.x,       0, "Starting X location",   "NUM"},
00640     { "start-y",          'y', POPT_ARG_DOUBLE,  &initialLoc.y,       0, "Starting Y location",   "NUM"},
00641     { "start-angle",      'a', POPT_ARG_DOUBLE,  &initialAngle,       0, "Starting Angle",        "NUM"},
00642     { "use-point-cloud",  'p', POPT_ARG_NONE,    &usePointCloud,      0, "Use Point Cloud",       "NONE"},
00643     { "no-lidar",         'l', POPT_ARG_NONE,    &noLidar,            0, "No LIDAR Observations", "NONE"},
00644     { "Alpha1-param",     'u', POPT_ARG_DOUBLE,  &motionParams.Alpha1,  0, "Alpha1 parameter",   "NUM"},
00645     { "Alpha2-param",     'v', POPT_ARG_DOUBLE,  &motionParams.Alpha2,  0, "Alpha2 parameter",   "NUM"},
00646     { "Alpha3-param",     'w', POPT_ARG_DOUBLE,  &motionParams.Alpha3,  0, "Alpha3 parameter",   "NUM"},
00647     
00648     POPT_AUTOHELP
00649     { NULL, 0, 0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL }
00650   };
00651   // parse options
00652   POpt popt(NULL,argc,(const char**)argv,options,0);
00653   int c;
00654   while((c = popt.getNextOpt()) >= 0){
00655   }
00656   
00657   //========================= Welcome screen, Load map & log ========================
00658   if(debugLevel>=0)
00659     __attribute__ (unused) int sysReturn = system("clear\n");
00660   
00661   ColourTerminal(TerminalUtils::TERMINAL_COL_WHITE,TerminalUtils::TERMINAL_COL_BLACK,TerminalUtils::TERMINAL_ATTR_BRIGHT);
00662   printf("\nVector Localization\n\n");
00663   ResetTerminal();
00664   
00665   if(debugLevel>=0){
00666     printf("NumParticles     : %d\n",numParticles);
00667     printf("Alpha1           : %f\n",motionParams.Alpha1);
00668     printf("Alpha2           : %f\n",motionParams.Alpha2);
00669     printf("Alpha3           : %f\n",motionParams.Alpha3);
00670     printf("UsePointCloud    : %d\n",usePointCloud?1:0);
00671     printf("UseLIDAR         : %d\n",noLidar?0:1);
00672     printf("Visualizations   : %d\n",debugLevel>=0?1:0);
00673     printf("\n");
00674   }
00675   double seed = floor(fmod(GetTimeSec()*1000000.0,1000000.0));
00676   if(debugLevel>-1) printf("Seeding with %d\n",(unsigned int)seed);
00677   srand(seed);
00678   
00679   //Initialize particle filter, sensor model, motion model, refine model
00680   string mapsFolder(ros::package::getPath("cgr_localization").append("/maps/"));
00681   localization = new VectorLocalization2D(mapsFolder.c_str());
00682   InitModels();
00683   
00684   //Initialize particle filter
00685   localization->initialize(numParticles,curMapName.c_str(),initialLoc,initialAngle,locUncertainty,angleUncertainty);
00686   
00687   //Initialize ros for sensor and odometry topics
00688   InitHandleStop(&run);
00689   ros::init(argc, argv, "CGR_Localization");
00690   ros::NodeHandle n;
00691   guiPublisher = n.advertise<DisplayMsg>("localization_gui",1,true);
00692   localizationPublisher = n.advertise<LocalizationMsg>("localization",1,true);
00693   particlesPublisher = n.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseArray>("particlecloud",1,false);
00694   Sleep(0.1);
00695   
00696   localizationServer = n.advertiseService("localization_interface", &localizationCallback);
00697   
00698   //Initialize ros for sensor and odometry topics
00699   ros::Subscriber odometrySubscriber = n.subscribe("odom", 20, odometryCallback);
00700   ros::Subscriber lidarSubscriber = n.subscribe("scan", 5, lidarCallback);
00701   ros::Subscriber kinectSubscriber = n.subscribe("kinect_depth", 1, depthCallback);
00702   ros::Subscriber initialPoseSubscriber = n.subscribe("initialpose",1,initialPoseCallback);
00703   transformListener = new tf::TransformListener(ros::Duration(10.0));
00704   transformBroadcaster = new tf::TransformBroadcaster();  
00705   
00706   filteredPointCloudPublisher = n.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud>("Cobot/Kinect/FilteredPointCloud", 1);
00707   
00708   while(ros::ok() && run){
00709     ros::spinOnce();
00710     publishGUI();
00711     publishLocation();
00712     Sleep(0.005);
00713   }
00714   
00715   if(debugLevel>=0) printf("closing.\n");
00716   return 0;
00717 }
